title: Manage Environmental Compliance for Dredging
description: The port is conducting maintenance dredging of a channel. An environmental officer must monitor for compliance.

tasks.description: Review the environmental permit for the dredging project, noting any specific conditions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer reviews the permit, which requires monitoring of water turbidity.

tasks.description: Check the real-time water quality sensor data near the dredging operation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer checks the turbidity sensor readings on their dashboard.

tasks.description: If turbidity exceeds permitted levels, instruct the dredging contractor to pause operations until it subsides.
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer sees a spike in turbidity, contacts the contractor, and instructs them to stop work temporarily, logging the action.
